Title: Beside the Dying Fire
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Robert Kirkman, Glen Mazzara
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: As the farm is overrun by walkers, the group fights to escape.
